div.div: Frequently Asked
Questions
Is this course suitable for working professionals with no skill and prior experience as freelancer?
Yes, this course is perfect for working professionals who are beginners with no prior skill set or for someone at intermediate level in freelancing.
Q2. Will I be able to replace my job income with freelancing?
Yes, with consistent effort, many freelancers start earning ₹50K-1L per month and even transition full-time.
Will I learn how to scale my freelancing business?
Yes, you’ll learn how to start from zero and attract high-paying clients.
Can I do this course while having a 9-5 job?
Yes the duration of the course is self paced. You can complete it at your own pace
Can I start freelancing part-time while keeping my job?
Absolutely! You can take up small projects and gradually scale as you gain experience.
